Where do you spend all your time to find these? I don't even know how to put them on the boards!

How to find them: I find them from a wide variety of places. This one I found by search for TR-8R on google images. Giphy.com is a good place to start. 

How to post to the boards: just copy the images direct URL and paste it here:
1. Find desired image
2. Either right click the image and press copy image URL ( exact wording varies by Web browser), or drag the image into its own tab and copy the URL from there.
3. Paste the URL onto the boards

Note: Images from some websites will not post (s-media-cache for example), while others will not animate unless you add ?noredirect to the end of the URL (Imgur).

https://media1.giphy.com/media/3osxYjaU51nj1drij6/200w.gif
OMG IT WORKED!!!!

The other day my friends in this community wanted to do an inhouse with the 10 players online, 5 of them were like "nah we just want to do a normal." So the other 5 of us queued and GOT MATCHED AGAINST THEM.  BOOYA.
love ur memes fish take my upvote
https://edit911.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/02/thats-the-plan-dr.-horrible-neil-patrick-harris.gif?cbf00e

lol Im friends with these two brothers and they wanted to play by themselves because they though I would try doing some crazy meta again and there next game they got matched against me so I went full ad attack speed lux and just completely destroyed them they never doubt my builds again

I saw this and said to myself 

"That'll never happen"

Next game I was against a guy who I thought was my friend, but his name was off by ONE LETTER
Happened to me once ,we started feeding each other at toplane ^^
I played against someone I know in real life in a random match up and it was the craziest thing I ever experienced. Never had it happen again. :'(
Dear god, do you make your own gifs or something? you are always prepared!
I played against one person so many times that I literally just made the person my friend and told the person to stop playing against me, and also to love me. Neither of these worked :'{
If that person  loves you , that person will come back to you . ... They always come back ... for more :)  .
